category.item: Take a look at your missions! Click on the Missions button in the Main Menu to accept missions and complete challenges.
Click the symbol containing three figures on the Space Map. There you can invite other players to join your group or see if someone else has invited you to join their group.

In the Main Menu under Hangar, you'll find weapons, ammo, boosters, drones and much more!

Arm your ship to the hilt and be ready for any and all battles!

... and you don't want to have to keep modifying your ship? Then use 2 different configurations in your ship.

Equip both configurations with items in the Hangar. To change items press C!
Everyone takes advantage of benefits but you?
Well then, what are you waiting for? Free ship repairs and so much more are waiting for you in our Premium Packs.
Honor to whom honor is due!

The more honor you win in Orbit, the quicker you advance in rank in your company.
Complete missions and destroy as many enemies as possible and fame and honor are sure to be yours!
Uridium is the most valuable ore in Orbit!

Aliens often carry it on them, so destroy them to get your hands on some! It can also be found in bonus boxes.
No luck finding any uridium? Then just buy some under Uridium in the Main Menu
100 years after the legendary voyage of the Titanic

100 years ago, the luxury liner to end all luxury liners, the Titanic, collided with an iceberg and sunk. There will be an event from 14 April until 17 April in rememberance of the Titanic's tragic voyage.

Try out DarkOrbit, now in fullscreen mode.
Just click the fullscreen button now!

Update Flash Player and
take off in fullscreen mode!
Configure the new UI in your own area.
You can find the Config mode for these options under Interface in the Settings menu.
